name: morePhyML
title: morePhyML

tstvratio1.prompt: Estimated transition/transversion ratio for DNA sequences? (-t)

tstvratio2.prompt: User transition/transversion ratio for DNA sequences? (-t)

nbsubstcat.prompt: Number of relative substitution rate categories (-c)

format.python: ("", " -c "+str(value))[value is not None and value != vdef]

authorized_values.label: m: equilibrium frequency estimated by ML for nucleotides or defined by the substitution model for amino acids.
e: equilibrium frequency estimated by counting the occurence of each character state in the alignment.

randomNumber.prompt: Number of random starting trees to be used (-n)

likelihoodCar.prompt: Write the likelihood for each character (-l)

firstRun.prompt: Write the results outputed by the first run of phyml (-x)

comment: <text lang="en">MIX is a general parsimony program which carries out the Wagner and Camin-Sokal parsimony methods in mixture, where each character can have its method specified separately. The program defaults to carrying out Wagner parsimony.</text> </comment>
